20110131191108.000|20110131191110.000|TR0|administration now admitting that 
20110131191110.000|20110131191113.000|TR0|President Mubarak should leave?
20110131191113.000|20110131191115.000|TR0|
20110131191115.000|20110131191118.000|TR0|GIBBS:  Again, Dan, that's -- that is -- I 
20110131191118.000|20110131191120.000|TR0|do believe orderly transition means 
20110131191120.000|20110131191123.000|TR0|change, and what we've advocated from the 
20110131191123.000|20110131191125.000|TR0|very beginning is that the way Egypt looks 
20110131191125.000|20110131191128.000|TR0|and operates must change. That's why we 
20110131191128.000|20110131191131.000|TR0|believe we should increase the amount of 
20110131191131.000|20110131191133.000|TR0|freedom that is had by the Egyptian people 
20110131191133.000|20110131191136.000|TR0|on association, on assembly, on speech, on 
20110131191136.000|20110131191138.000|TR0|Internet and open communication.
20110131191138.000|20110131191141.000|TR0|
20110131191141.000|20110131191143.000|TR0|But that's not for us to determine what 
20110131191143.000|20110131191146.000|TR0|the parameters and what the limits of 
20110131191146.000|20110131191149.000|TR0|those are.  But undoubtedly -- undoubtedly 
20110131191149.000|20110131191151.000|TR0|transition in this case means change.  
20110131191151.000|20110131191154.000|TR0|There's no doubt about it.
20110131191154.000|20110131191156.000|TR0|
20110131191156.000|20110131191159.000|TR0|LOTHIAN:  If he's the leader, though, are 
20110131191159.000|20110131191201.000|TR0|you not saying that he should be changed

20110131193416.000|20110131193419.000|TR0|the government tried to stop it all by

20110131193427.000|20110131193429.000|TR0|mosques emptied, and a lot of people

20110131193439.000|20110131193442.000|TR0|army was ordered into the streets. 
20110131193442.000|20110131193444.000|TR0|Saturday, they did  into the streets, few 
20110131193444.000|20110131193447.000|TR0|clashes in Cairo, Alexandria, and Suez.

20110131195913.000|20110131195915.000|TR0|Supreme Court will address this issue well 
20110131195915.000|20110131195918.000|TR0|before 2014, because now we have so many 
20110131195918.000|20110131195920.000|TR0|different decisions all over the lot.

20110131195923.000|20110131195925.000|TR0|States Supreme Court, to settle when
